name: workingDirectory
signature: { (cwd: string): (self: Command) => Command; (self: Command, cwd: string): Command; }
description:
Set the working directory that will be used when this command will be run. For piped commands, the working directory of each command will be set to the
specified working directory.
documentation:
Set the working directory that will be used when this command will be run.

For piped commands, the working directory of each command will be set to the
specified working directory.
